ygData.subject: RE: Bard Hate...
ygData.msgSnippet: My favorite personal example is from when I was young.  I was standing on Reaver Hill in E Karana near the river watching some higher level folks pull some
ygData.messageBody:
My favorite personal example is from when I was young. I was standing on
Reaver Hill in E Karana near the river watching some higher level folks pull
some gnolls so I could get some cool screenshots. I was playing no song,
just standing there watching their ranger pull an undead reaver and 2
regular gnolls back to the group. As they came over the rise I watched all
3 gnolls actually catch, and pass!, the ranger pulling them. As I watched
confused lining up my screenshot the 3 gnolls ran right over the top of the
ranger's two mates, getting nuked as they came, and immediately proceeded to
beat on me! I was at full health at the time, not playing anything, and not
even in the group with the puller. Fortunately I made it to the zone with a
bubble of health left.

Kitasi of E'ci

-----Original Message-----
From: Rokenn Swiftsong [mailto:rokenn@...]
Sent: Friday, October 22, 1999 9:57 AM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Bard Hate...


From: "Rokenn Swiftsong" <rokenn@...>

An example of bard hate, last night in Lower Guk our party is fighting a
frog shamen. I am NOT engaged in melee, but sitting back and playing only
Clarity (aka Mana song). The Shaman, not once, not twice, but THREE times
attempts to cast Tagar's Insects on me (melee speed debuff). Very silly
AI:p I have also had the same thing happen numerous times in High Hold
Pass. Where I will stop to watch someone fight a Gnoll Shamen (in case they

need help) and the Shamen turns and casts on me! I have never attacked it or

assisted the person attacking it, go figure.

Rokenn Swiftsong - Karana server

>From: galen@...
>Reply-To: eqbards@onelist.com
>To: eqbards@onelist.com
>Subject: [eqbards] Bard Hate...
>Date: 22 Oct 1999 15:18:53 -0000
>
>I have been hearing rumors that "bard hate" does not really exist... Anyone

>actually have proof that it does?

Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to toren@... with
the subject lol.
